description: Create a VE, assign IP addresses and VRF on multiple switches.
name: create_ve

ip_address.description: Single or list of IPv4/IPv6 addresses to be configured on the VE. IPv4/subnet-length or IPv6/prefix-length, for example 10.0.0.10/22, 30.0.0.10/22.

mgmt_ip.description: Management IP address of the target device

password.description: Login password to connect to the device

rbridge_id.description: Single or list of RBridge IDs separated by comma, for example, 1 or 1,2, 4.  This parameter is only applicable for VDX switches.

username.description: Login user name to connect to the device

vlan_id.description: Interface VLAN ID. <NUMBER:1-4090/8191>, can be greater than 4090 only if VF is enabled.

vrf_name.description: VRF name. For example vrf32 or 32
